title: Monitor Bridge Traffic for Structural Analysis
description: Structural engineers need to know the weight of vehicles that have crossed a bridge to calibrate their structural health models.

tasks.description: Retrieve data from the 'Weigh-in-Motion' sensors embedded in the 'South Bridge' for the past week.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully queries the sensor database.

tasks.description: Calculate the total tonnage and the number of overweight vehicles that crossed the bridge.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system aggregates the weight data.

tasks.description: Generate a report of the traffic load data for the engineering department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the engineers with the data they need for their analysis.
